## Dialettometrizazione dei corpus

```{r taula erakusteko, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
a <- read.csv('data/bourciez-taulazabalduan-b.csv')[1:10, c(1,5:8)]
row.names(a) <- a[,1]
a <- a[,2:5]
names(a) <- 1:4

knitr::kable(a)
```
